profile.name: UPPUTURI SUMAN
profile.title: Java Developer
profile.summary: Dedicated Full-Stack Java Developer with practical experience in Spring Boot, REST APIs, and MySQL. Proficient in building scalable applications using Core Java, React.js, and modern MVC architecture. Passionate about creating efficient, user-friendly solutions.

projects.title: Question Paper Generator System
projects.description: A comprehensive full-stack Java application for generating dynamic question papers. Features include question bank management, difficulty-based selection, and automated paper generation with customizable templates.

projects.title: Tic Tac Toe Game
projects.description: An interactive console-based Java application implementing classic Tic Tac Toe with turn-based logic, board validation, win detection algorithms, and clean OOP design patterns.

description: Developed RESTful APIs using Spring Boot for enterprise applications
Implemented database operations with MySQL and JDBC
Built responsive front-end components using React.js
Collaborated with senior developers on code reviews and best practices
Created dynamic web applications using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript
Developed server-side logic with Java Servlets and JSP
Integrated MySQL databases for data persistence
Participated in agile development sprints and daily standups

education.institution: MVR College of Engineering and Technology
